name: ezwinports
short_description:
This project is a collection of ports to MS-Windows of GNU and Unix software packages, which either don't have precompiled Windows binaries available, or whose existing ports are buggy or broken.
All the ports are built using the MinGW development environment, with or without MSYS.
summary: Ports of Unix and GNU software to MS-Windows

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 3.0 (GPLv3)

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Advanced End Users
Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Emulation and API Compatibility :: MinGW/MSYS (MS Windows)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 32-bit MS Windows (95/98)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 32-bit MS Windows (NT/2000/XP)
Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows
